oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Selection from major grañths intended for students undergoing instruction in their melodies.
Hardboard covers, binding in poor condition; pages in fair condition.
Frontispiece: full portrait of Aga Khan III in official regalia.
Preface on the necessity of publishing this book (pp. 1.1-3) and list of publications of the Khojā Siñdhī Printing Press (pp. 3.1-6).
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
